code: import axios from'axios';import React,{useState}from'react';import'./App.css';import SearchForm from'./SearchForm';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const apiKey=process.env.REACT_APP_API_KEY;const apiURL='https://api.spoonacular.com/recipes';function App(){const[recipes,setRecipes]=useState([]);const handleSearchByIngredients=async ingredients=>{const endpoint='/findByIngredients';const urlToFetch=`${apiURL}${endpoint}`;const params={ingredients,number:5,apiKey};try{const response=await axios.get(urlToFetch,{params});setRecipes(response.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching data:",error);alert("Data cannot be fetched, sorry");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"What's in your fridge?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchForm,{onSearch:handleSearchByIngredients})]});}export default App;
